name: Fire Keeper (Sleetag, zantcho, Pouzee, alexmoutouh, NaXiBel, Bazouboutchou)
name_original: Fire Keeper (Sleetag, zantcho, Pouzee, alexmoutouh, NaXiBel, Bazouboutchou)
description:
First game jam for all of us.

Made it from scratch except tileset.

Made in unity for ludum dare 46, theme was keep it alive

Game :

Play as a lumberjack, you need to feed your campfire.

However, your camp attract dangerous monsters who want to use it.

You have one mission : keep it alive

Credits 

Pipoya RPG tileset : https://pipoya.itch.io/pipoya-rpg-tileset-32x32

Controls : 
'F' to feed fire
'E' to cut tree/attack
